__e: Or fight your last days here amongst your friends?
Why do you hang out with my dad?
Why do you spend day after day sitting in rooms with people like that... and let them make a fool out of you?
If you don't think I'm capable of change, why spend an entire day with me by bringing me out into the middle of nowhere?
I don't know what happened last night, but when we get back home, maybe you'd better spend more time on the roof.
I mean, you spend most of your life at work, not at home. And not with your wife, not with friends.
Your life is empty because you spend it trying to stop the bomb from becoming.
You spend too much time worrying about what other people think of you.
You spend too much time thinking about the past.
You know, as cool as it is, you spend your time chasing thieves and murderers.
Okay, well, maybe if you spent more time convincing your mom and less time swindling people, you might get what you want.
If you spend your every spare moment drawing your pictures, dreaming of another life, you're going to wind up never living the one you got.
You'd better stop scaring me unless you want to stay outside all night.
I think she just wishes You'd spend half the time on her That you do on these people you don't even know.
No, but you came here with this big secret, but you've spent the whole time telling me what's wrong with my life!
